Name: Blue Waters Resort Dahab
Description: Boutique beach resort offering stunning views of the Red Sea, with direct access to world-renowned diving and snorkeling sites.

Name: Sinai Mountain Lodge
Description: Eco-friendly hotel nestled in the mountains, offering breathtaking views and traditional Bedouin hospitality.

Name: Red Sea Luxury Collection
Description: Opulent five-star hotel in El Gouna, featuring multiple pools, private beaches, and world-class amenities.

Name: Coral Coast Resort
Description: Intimate resort offering exceptional diving experiences and direct access to some of the most pristine coral reefs in the Red Sea.

Name: Desert Sun Hotel
Description: Modern hotel blending contemporary design with traditional Bedouin elements, located in the heart of the Sinai Peninsula.

Name: Hurghada Marina Palace
Description: Luxurious waterfront hotel offering panoramic views of the marina, with easy access to local attractions and water sports.

Name: Turquoise Waters Resort
Description: Family-friendly resort with multiple pools, kids' club, and comprehensive entertainment programs.

Name: Windsurf Paradise Hotel
Description: Specialized resort catering to water sports enthusiasts, with professional-grade equipment and expert instructors.

Name: Oasis Wellness Retreat
Description: Tranquil hotel focusing on holistic wellness, offering spa treatments, yoga classes, and meditation spaces.

Name: Marine Life Resort
Description: Eco-conscious hotel with marine biology programs, offering educational experiences and conservation activities.

Name: Royal Gateway Hotel
Description: Elegant hotel combining modern luxury with traditional Egyptian hospitality, located in the vibrant El Gouna district.

Name: Mountain View Inn
Description: Cozy mountain hotel offering stunning views of the Sinai landscape, perfect for nature lovers and adventure seekers.

Name: Sunset Beach Resort
Description: Beachfront resort known for its spectacular sunset views and comprehensive water activities.

Name: Bedouin Heritage Hotel
Description: Unique accommodation showcasing authentic Bedouin culture, with traditional tents and modern amenities.

Name: Reef Explorer Lodge
Description: Specialized diving hotel with on-site dive center, offering courses for all levels and access to premier diving sites.

Name: Garden of Eden Resort
Description: Lush green resort featuring exotic gardens, multiple swimming pools, and a serene atmosphere.

Name: Cultural Crossroads Hotel
Description: Boutique hotel celebrating the rich historical and cultural heritage of the Sinai Peninsula.

Name: Maritime Explorer Hotel
Description: Modern hotel catering to sailing and maritime enthusiasts, with direct marina access and boat rental services.

Name: Desert Rose Wellness Hotel
Description: Comprehensive wellness destination offering holistic health programs, meditation retreats, and natural healing treatments.

Name: Coastal Harmony Resort
Description: Sustainable eco-resort focusing on environmental conservation and offering immersive nature experiences.
